item.title: Travels and Adventures in Southern Africa
item.scopeAndContent: [Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: A digitised copy of 'Travels and adventures in Southern Africa' by George Thompson, ESQ. Eight years a resident at the Cape. Comprising a view of the present state of the Cape colony with observations on the progress and prospects of the British emigrants. London: Henry Colburn, New Burlington Street, 1827.]
